sub_title: Associate Lawyer at Vieira Rezende Advogados
summary: Vieira, Rezende, Barbosa e Guerreiro Advogados participates in some of Brazil’s most important business deals, advising large companies and national and international investment funds, as well as institutional investors such as pension funds, in the structuring of investments, and in mergers, incorporations and acquisitions. It also assists financial institutions, private investors and government agencies in financing and in developing projects involving natural resources and infrastructure, and has helped its clients, such as financial institutions and private companies, with the most diverse real estate businesses and banking transactions such as structured loans, guaranty and security agreements, securitizations and trade finance. In the petroleum, natural gas and biofuels sector, it offers a highly specialized team, with capability to supply the demand for services from the wide variety of players involved this activity. Moreover, the firm represents companies implementing programs to comply with antitrust laws and individual creditors and bank syndicates in debt restructuring transactions in the area of judicial and extrajudicial recovery.

school.name: Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro

test_scores.name: TOEFL (Test of English as a Foreign Language)

profile_positions.location: Rio de Janeiro e Região, Brasil
profile_positions.description:
Field: Consultant in Business Law, including Mergers & Acquisitions, Corporate, Capital Market, Business Relations, Contracts, Competition, Regulation, Corporate Governance and Administrative Law.

Main operations:

-	Advised an investment vehicle for a capital increase of 5.3 billion reais (US$2.6 billion) from equity investors, used to fund a project to build rigs capable of exploiting oil reserves off Brazil's southeast coast.
-	Assisted in the installment of a steel industry on the Brazilian ZPE zone (the free exportation zone, created for companies to export their products), worth 4 billion reais (US$2 billion), including the entry of the South Korea’s largest steel producer as a partner of the project.
-	Advised a group of companies in study for the development and construction of Recife´s Arco Metropolitano, a link between two distant municipalities and a port, bypassing the City of Recife, a project worth 1.8 billion reais (US$900 million).
-	Advised a Brazilian company on its partnership with a Canadian mining company, regarding mining exploration permits in the State of Bahia.
-	Successfully managed mergers & acquisitions demands, advising companies in corporate restructurings involving mergers, incorporations, spin-offs and others.
-	Assisted international companies to acquire Brazilian receipts and to run their activities in Brazil, as well as domestic and international companies to open their capital in the Brazilian Stock Exchange.
-	Represented clients involved in private equity and strategic investments.
-	Participated in due diligences.
-	Provided consulting services related to pre-litigation and arbitration strategies.
-	Represented companies and shareholders in claims before the Securities Commission and the Appeals Council of the National Financial System.
-	Accompanied administrative proceedings before regulatory authorities.

Discontinued the position in order to pursue a Master's degree (International Business Law) in the Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Associate Lawyer

profile_positions.location: Rio de Janeiro e Região, Brasil
profile_positions.description:
Field: Litigation

-	Prepared pleadings and cases for trial.
-	Assisted lawyers with all aspects of litigation, from the collection of evidence to appeal.
-	Prepared reports, memoranda and correspondence.
-	Managed administrative duties such as recording office expenses, raising invoices,       maintaining databases and contacting clients.
-	Organized client libraries in hardcopy and electronic format.
-	Responsible for legal, doctrinal and jurisprudence researches
